runs.comm: full ball first-up, which Gilchrist pushes to cover
down the leg side, Gilchrist misses out on the flick off the hips and Dhoni does the collecting, first run for Australia
full ball outside off stump, Gilchrist drives but with too much bottom-hand and the ball goes straight to cover
overpitched on middle and leg and Gilchrist doesnt let it go, just tucking it off the pads through midwicket for four
full outside off stump this time and Gilchrist drives loosely, connecting with nothing but air, oohs and aahs from the slip and fielders
and again! This one's held back a touch but still Gilchrist stands his ground and gives it the kitchen sink, missing, and RP lets out a very long appeal even as Dhoni stays mum
fuller length, Gilchrist drives into the covers but cant beat any of the men there and thats the end of a decent openng over from RP Singh
low full toss outside off stump, Hayden thumps it past mid-off and extra-cover and stands and admires the shot
back of a length, shaving away just above the top of off stump as Hayden shoulders arms
now he walks down the track and heaves across the line, definitely eyeing mid-on, but misses out on the shot, looked ungainly in the end
back of a length outside off stump, Hayden has a thought about it but then holds back on the shot, allowing it through to Dhoni
again its bowled back of a length outside off stump and Hayden leaves it alone, crucial dot balls these for India
good ball, coming in off a length and cramping Hayden for room, and he ends up inside-edging it past leg stumps for a single
full delivery outside off stump, driven uppishly to Uthappa in the covers
short delivery outside off stump, Hayden looks to pull but then pulls out at the last minute as the ball grows on him, very well  bowled by RP
pushed through fuller down leg stump, Hayden flicks but mistimes it, the ball rolling to point
good length outside off stump, streakily square-driven through point for one
back of a length on middle and leg, well driven to mid-on, and well stopped
good stuff! Gilchrist sees the full delivery on leg stump and just flicks it over midwicket for a big six, first dinger for Australia
walks down the track, swings across the line and misses all ends up
good ball, almost a yorker on off stump, dug back to Sreesanth, who collects and shies a throw back at the stumps, but Hayden doesnt flinch
and again! Hayden steps out and heaves at a good length delivery but cant connect
good ball! Back of a length, nipping off the seam, and beating Hayden as he pokes at it off the back foot

good length, beats him on the hop, catches him on the front pad in front of off stump, they all appeal but the umpire shakes his head, and replays show it was too high....wow, thats a long, pleading appeal from Sreesanth
good ball to end the over, full and Hayden defends it back to Sreesanth
back of a length on the stumps, Gilchrist stands and whips it over mid-on and the ball trickles over the ropes even as the sweeper approaches

fullish delivery, Gilchrist gets under it and drives back down the ground, not in total control, the balls up in the air and looks like it'll drop in between mid-off and mid-on but it ends up just over the ropes
better ball, full on a yorker length and Gilchrist digs it out to point
shot! Hayden walks down the pitch and takes it on the full, driving back over the bowler's head for a straight four, one bounce and over the boundary
full down leg stump, misses out on the flick, ball clips the boot and rolls to midwicket
another yorker-length delivery on leg stump, tucked out to mid-on for one

bowled em! Sreesanth pitches full on the stumps, Gilchrist doesnt move his feet an inch, instead choosing to fatefully play from deep in the crease, misses out on the attempted on-drive, and loses his middle stump! Big wicket for India!
good length outside off stump, he leaves it be for Dhoni
good length, moves in as Hodge tentatively comes onto the front foot and defends
short and wide, Hodge gets up and steers it over the vacant gully region and down to RP at third man for one
good length, angling away from outside off stump, Hayden gets forward and then shoulders arms
and again, back of a length and Hayden lets it go
back of a length, Hodge stands and pushes to cover, no run there
back of a length, saw him coming, and Hodge can only steer to Yuvraj at point
short outside off stump, gets over it and cuts wide of Yuvraj for two, Sreesanth does the work out in the deep
comes out, Pathan sees him again and adjusts the length, and Hodge just pushes into the covers
cheeky! Hayden walks across, to outside off, and flicks a full delivery over square leg for four!
makes room, Pathan bowls it slower and wider, Hayden reaches out and slaps it just over cover, Hodge runs well and they get two
back of a length on leg stump, tucked fine for a single
comes out, Sharma bowls a loosener on leg stump, Hayden swivels and doesnt time his shot to perfection but with fine leg up the ball trickles down for four
short and wide, cracked hard to Uthappa at cover
huge! Out of the ground! Hayden gets down and swings this miles back over deep midwicket for a massive shot!
back of a length, wide, chopped towards point
full on off stump and thats a clean smack over cow corner for six, top shot from Hodge and Sharma is taken to the cleaners!
short ball, Hayden goes for a slog, the ball balloons up over short fine leg and lands safely
wide delivery, Hayden swings and misses, Dhoni collects and thats a freebie
back of a length outside off stump, decent pace, Hayden swings across the line and misses
slower ball, full outside off stump, Hayden drags it across the line to mid-on
gone! Wasnt a decent ball, pitching well outside leg stump on a short length, but all Hodge can do is swivel and pull it straight to Joginder at short fine leg!
full outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to Yuvraj at point, and there are cheers from the crowd

back of a length, room on offer, chopped to the left of Yuvraj and the ball slows up near the ropes but Sreesanth makes a mess of it, diving and tumbling and then letting the ball slip out of his fingers and roll into the boundary, very sloppy
tossed up from around the stumps, driven into the covers for two
short and wide, spins somewhat after pitching, Hayden misses out on the cut and looks at the umpire
tossed up on a length, worked out to deep midwicket for one
tossed up nicely, no room to drive, Symonds gets forward and plays it back to Harbhajan
fuller and flatter on leg stump, turned out to Sreesanth and deep fine leg for a couple more
tossed up, he uses the feet and drives but straight to point
short of a driving length and outside the off, flat-batted down to long-on for a single
short of a good length and on the stumps, a hint of swing in, chopped down to third-man
full and just outside the off, Hayden drags the ball down towards long-on
short of a good length and outside the off, hit inside out and over cover. There's a man on the ropes but this is too high for him
once again back of a length and on the stumps, Symonds waits on the ball and chops it down to third-man
Big one! Hayden just lines that one up and tees off. That is a massive hit over long-on. No-one's getting anywhere near that unless they're in the stands
down the pitch, Harbhajan sends the ball in quicker and flat, sweep played, off the edge over the wicketkeeper
very full and quite straight, played down to long-on for an easy single
flat and outside the off, Hayden comes down the track and pushes that through the on side
fired in quick and flat on the pads, attempted yorker almost, dug out to the on side
tossed up just a touch more, fullish, driven hard back to the bowler
down the pitch comes Hayden, Harbhajan pushes that wide of off, carved over the infield wide of long-off
low loopy full-toss on the pads, clipped away wide of midwicket
tossed up and on the leg stump, Hayden sweeps, bottom edge dribbles just past the leg stump
fullish and outside the off, tossed up too, driven inside out to cover
Maximum! full-toss outside the off. Hayden sees that early and clubs it into the stands over long-on. That's a half-century for Hayden
No-ball, two runs as the ball is whacked into the leg side, free hit coming up ...
carved over the off side, Uthappa runs across on the ropes and saves the ball

tossed up and on the off, Hayden lines this one up and strikes it into the stands over long-on. Big muscular drive from Hayden and this is a big over for Australia. The gamble doesn't pay off for Dhoni
flat and on the off, Symonds just drags this one across to midwicket. It's high but has more than enough on it to clear the ropes
full and on the stumps, driven inside out towards cover
flighted, held back, a bit of loop and turn, through to the keeper
flatter and on the off, driven very hard to the off side, Harbhajan dives and stops the ball
short of a good length and outside the off, chopped down towards point
low full-toss outside the off, driven towards midwicket and a frantic single is scampered as the throw comes in
fullish and outside the off, Symonds gives himself some room and plays a big drive. Thick inside edge past leg stump. Dhoni dives and collects.
short of a length and outside the off, Symonds pulls away from the stumps and hacks that one away fine to the third-man boundary
fullish and outside the off stump, again Symonds backs away, this time jammed away past point

Biggie! Sreesanth comes round the stumps and powers the yorker in. It's quick, it's on target, it's just a bit too good for Hayden's ambitious shot. The ball sneaks under bat and uproots the off stump. This is a huge, huge wicket from Sreesanth in his comeback over
fullish and outside the off, Hussey eases thos through cover with an angled bat
full and on the stump, very full in fact and ends up as a full-toss on the body, Symonds defends back down the pitch. That's the end of a genuinely good spell from Sreesanth
low full-toss on the leg stump, Symonds waits for that and just swats it for four backward of square on the leg side. That's not very clever bowling.
low full-toss on the leg stump, hit away in the air down to long-on. Uthappa charges in and dives low but can't take the catch
short one banged in, a bit opd extra pace, Symonds swings and misses, the ball goes quite high and through to the keeper. Wide called on height
low full-toss on the leg stump, driven down to long-on and power running gets the batsmen two
low full-toss on the stumps, attempted yorker, dug out to long-on for a single
very full and on the off, driven to the off side, the first call is for the single, there's a bit of a misfield and the batsmen get back for a second. It's Hayden running for Hussey
down the leg side, flick played and missed, Dhoni just fails to gather and a bye is stolen
Crack! Now Hussey turns it on. Length ball outside the off. Hussey flat-bats this into the stands over wide long-on. Huge!
fullish and outside the off, driven inside out to cover for a quick run

Another strike! It's a big one for India as Symonds loses his off stump. Pathan is bang on target as Symonds backs away and tries to hit. The ball crashes into off stump and India are right back in this nail-biter of a game
short of a good length, on the pads, clipped away wide of the fielder at short fine-leg for a couple
slower ball, on the pads, once again Clarke works it away and this time it'll just be the single as short fine-leg fields

Yorker! Michael Clarke doesn't expect this from Harbhajan and has no answer as he walks down the crease and the ball just spears into the leg stump. Another really quality bit of bowling and this might just be the wicket that tilts the scales in India's favour
short of a good length, outside the off, tossed up a touch more, defended to off for a quick run
very full and on the stumps, Hussey drives but can only get a thick inside edge back onto pad
tossed up and outside the off, again driven, no chance of a run and a priceless dot ball
fullish and outside the off, driven inside out through cover and that's a couple more to Australia in a good over for India
very full and on the pads, speared in, not much the batsman can do but work the ball to the on side. End of a fine over from Harbhajan
short of a length and outside the off, big swing and a miss from Haddin
quick one outside the off, angling away from Haddin who swings and misses, through to the keeper
Very high full-toss from RP Singh. A beamer from RP Singh that hits Haddin on the head almost. He just manages to fend it away with glove. No-ball called and RP apologises
full and on the off, driven at, thick inside edge back onto pad
short of a driving length, on the off, heaved over the infield but it won't go all the way, just the single
very full and outside the off, going away with the angle, another huge swing and a miss and nothing but air. No contact between bat and ball and another drop of gold for India, a dot ball
driven down to long-off, a couple of runs and end of a quality over from RP Singh
fullish and outside the off, driven at, through to the keeper, no run. Great result from the first ball for Joginder and India
full and very straight, driven back down the pitch to the bowler. Another dot ball. This is now really  tough for Australia

short of a good length and outside the off, big heave to the on side, that one goes high rather than far, Yuvraj Singh runs across to wide long-on and holds the catch. Now surely that is the end of that. Big, big wicket for Joginder in a big over
low full-toss on the off stump, thumped over the leg side, just two and now 20 needed from 2 balls. India are through to the final barring a no-ball
full, straight yorker and Lee has no chance as he has a big heave. The leg stump is uprooted and the Indians erupt in celebration. Another wicket as India really drive this win home

short one banged in, it's pulled for four but none of the Indian fielders care. India are in the final and it's against arch-rivals Pakistan! This has been a cracker of a game and India have pulled one over Australia
